block.p: MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Activated LHP Jon Lester from the 15-day DL and optioned him to Pawtucket (IL). DETROIT TIGERS--Optioned RHP Aquilino Lopez to Toledo (IL). SEATTLE MARINERS--Placed RHP Chris Reitsma on the 15-day DL. Recalled LHP Jake Woods from Tacoma (PCL). TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Recalled RHP Jason Hammel from Durham (IL). Announced RHP Jae Seo accepted his outright assignment to Durham. Released RHP Shinji Mori.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Reinstated OF Cliff Floyd from the bereavement list. Placed INF Aramis Ramirez on the 15-day DL, retroactive to June 7. METS--Activated OF Shawn Green from the 15-day DL. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Agreed to terms with C Juan Garcia, LHP Anthony Watson, INF Erik Huber, RHP Harrison Bishop, INF

Matt Cavagnaro, RHP Taylor Cameron and RHP Gary Amato. WASHINGTON NATIONALS--Agreed to terms with RHP Philip Dean, CF Mark Gildea, LHP Patrick McCoy, 1B Bill Rhinehart, SS Daniel Lyons, RHP Patrick Arnold, OF Chris Blackwood, RHP Luke Pisker, RHP Jeff Mandel, SS Jake Rogers, OF Aaron Seuss, RHP Devin Drag, RHP Randall Staudt, LHP Kai Tuomi, OF Garrett Bass and OF Jacob Dugger.
W.N.B.A.
LOS ANGELES SPARKS--Announced the retirement of F Chamique Holdsclaw.
N.F.L.

BUFFALO BILLS--Signed DE C.J. Ah You. CAROLINA PANTHERS--Signed QB Justin Zwick. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Signed G Uche Nwaneri. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Agreed to terms with CB Usama Young and G Andy Alleman on three-year contracts. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Signed DL Sam Rayburn.
N.H.L.
TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Re-signed C Nick Tarnasky to a three-year contract and RW Kyle Wanvig to a one-year contract.
